Package colorguard

Class LongRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • colorguard.GameObject
      • colorguard.Piece
        • colorguard.LongRange

  • public class LongRange
extends Piece
    LongRange is a type of Piece that can move 6 spots vertically. It can move 2 spots horizontally on its own side, and 1 spot horizontally on enemy territory
    Author:
    amaytripathi
    See Also:
